name: Paw Patrol: On A Roll!
description: PAW Patrol is on a roll! No job is too big, no pup is too small! Join the entire PAW Patrol team—including Everest and Tracker—for 16 exciting rescue missions around Adventure Bay! Help each pup use their unique abilities to help their friends and save the day!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 (2.4 GHz) or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 430 (1024 MB)/ Radeon HD 6850 (1024 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Windows Vista and DirectX® 9.0b and below not supported
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 10 Processor: Intel i5, 4 x 2.6 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Windows Vista and DirectX® 9.0b and below not supported
